featured.title: E-Commerce Platform
featured.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring real-time inventory management, secure payments, and admin dashboard.
featured.longDescription: This comprehensive e-commerce platform was built from scratch using modern web technologies. It includes a customer-facing store with product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout process, as well as a complete admin dashboard for inventory management, order processing, and analytics. The platform handles thousands of products and processes hundreds of orders daily.
challenges: Optimizing performance for large product catalogs

featured.title: Task Management App
featured.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.
featured.longDescription: Built with React and Node.js, this task management application enables teams to collaborate effectively on projects. Features include real-time updates using WebSockets, drag-and-drop task organization, time tracking, file attachments, and comprehensive reporting. The app supports multiple project views and integrates with popular tools like Slack and GitHub.

featured.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
featured.description: An intelligent customer support chatbot powered by OpenAI's GPT API, with custom training and integration capabilities.
featured.longDescription: This AI chatbot was developed to handle customer support inquiries for a SaaS company. It integrates with OpenAI's GPT API and includes custom training on company-specific knowledge. The bot can handle complex queries, escalate to human agents when needed, and provides analytics on customer interactions. It reduced response time by 80% and improved customer satisfaction scores.

other.title: Weather Dashboard
other.description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts and interactive maps.

other.title: Headless CMS Blog
other.description: A modern blog platform with headless CMS integration and markdown support.

other.title: Cryptocurrency Tracker
other.description: Real-time cryptocurrency price tracking with portfolio management features.
